game_description: Submarine takes you on a adventure-filled underwater simulation experience! Ever wanted to dive into ocean? Want to Discover beauty of underwater world? , This game is best for you! Dive deep and cruise through the endless uncharted nature of the ocean and you will see clownfish, dolphins, penguins and mysterious sea animals. Get close to the sea surface and sail in the open sea with your flying cruise ship. You are free in a world that you can do what you want! Install now and meet them in their magical worlds! Submarine - Game Features - Beautiful ocean landscapes - Stunning HD Graphics - Realistic underwater submarine physics - Easy and Free to use - No WiFi? No Problem.
Publisher: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
